sql.item: CREATE TABLE LOG ( RUN_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ANNOTATOR TEXT, START_DTM DATETIME, END_DTM DATETIME, NUM_NOTES NUMBER(22,0), COMMENTS TEXT);
CREATE TABLE ANNOTATORS ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ANNOTATOR TEXT, ADD_DTM DATETIME);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ANNOTATORS_INX ON ANNOTATORS (ANNOTATOR);

item.name: queryDocs
item.sql: SELECT DOC_ID,DATASET_ID, DOC_NAME, BUNCH_ID, TEXT SNIPPET,TEXT DOC_TEXT, DATE,REF_DATE, INSERT_DTM FROM {tableName}

item.name: queryAnnos
item.sql: SELECT ID,DOC_NAME,TYPE,SNIPPET,BEGIN,END,SNIPPET_BEGIN,TEXT,FEATURES,COMMENTS,ANNOTATOR,RUN_ID FROM {tableName} RS

item.name: querySnippetAnnos
item.sql: SELECT RS.ID,RS.DOC_NAME, RS.TYPE,RS.SNIPPET, RS.BEGIN,RS.END,RS.SNIPPET_BEGIN,IT.TEXT DOC_TEXT, RS.FEATURES,IT.DATE, IT.REF_DATE,RS.COMMENTS,RS.ANNOTATOR,RS.RUN_ID FROM {tableName} RS JOIN {inputTable} IT ON RS.DOC_NAME=IT.DOC_NAME

item.name: queryDocSnippetAnnos
item.sql: SELECT RD.ID,IT.BUNCH_ID,RD.DOC_NAME,RD.TYPE DOC_TYPE, RD.FEATURES DOC_FEATURES, RS.ID RSID, RS.TYPE,RS.SNIPPET,RS.BEGIN,RS.END,RS.SNIPPET_BEGIN,IT.TEXT DOC_TEXT, RS.FEATURES,IT.DATE, IT.REF_DATE,RS.COMMENTS,RD.ANNOTATOR,RD.RUN_ID FROM {docResultTable} RD LEFT OUTER JOIN {tableName} RS ON RD.DOC_NAME=RS.DOC_NAME AND RD.RUN_ID=RS.RUN_ID JOIN {inputTable} IT ON RD.DOC_NAME=IT.DOC_NAME

item.name: queryBunchDocSnippetAnnos
item.sql: SELECT RD.ID ,IT.BUNCH_ID,RD.DOC_NAME,RB.TYPE BUNCH_TYPE, RD.TYPE DOC_TYPE, RS.TYPE,RS.SNIPPET,RS.BEGIN,RS.END,RS.SNIPPET_BEGIN, RS.FEATURES,IT.DATE, IT.REF_DATE,RS.COMMENTS,RS.ANNOTATOR,RB.RUN_ID FROM {bunchResultTable} RB JOIN {inputTable} IT ON RB.BUNCH_ID=IT.BUNCH_ID JOIN {docResultTable} RD ON IT.DOC_NAME=RD.DOC_NAME AND RB.RUN_ID=RD.RUN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN {tableName} RS ON RD.DOC_NAME=RS.DOC_NAME AND RB.RUN_ID=RS.RUN_ID

item.name: LOG
item.sql: INSERT INTO LOG (ANNOTATOR, START_DTM, END_DTM, NUM_NOTES, COMMENTS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)

item.name: ANNOTATORS
item.sql: INSERT INTO ANNOTATORS (ANNOTATOR, ADD_DTM) VALUES (?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

item.name: LOG
item.sql: UPDATE LOG SET ANNOTATOR=?,START_DTM=?, END_DTM=?, NUM_NOTES=?, COMMENTS=? WHERE RUN_ID=?

sql.item: CREATE TABLE {tableName}(ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DOC_NAME TEXT, ANNOTATOR TEXT, RUN_ID INT, TYPE TEXT, BEGIN INT, END INT, SNIPPET_BEGIN INT, TEXT TEXT, FEATURES TEXT, SNIPPET TEXT, COMMENTS TEXT, CREATE_DTM DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_RUN_IND ON {tableName} (RUN_ID);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_TYPE_IND ON {tableName} (TYPE);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_ANNO_IND ON {tableName} (ANNOTATOR);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_DOC_IND ON {tableName} (DOC_NAME);
CREATE TABLE {tableName} ( DOC_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DATASET_ID CHAR(10), BUNCH_ID INTEGER, DOC_NAME TEXT, TEXT TEXT, DATE DATETIME, REF_DATE DATETIME, INSERT_DTM DATETIME);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_DOC_IND ON {tableName} (DOC_NAME);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_DATATSET_IND ON {tableName} (DATASET_ID);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {tableName}_BUNCH_IND ON {tableName} (BUNCH_ID);
